text: Ej mu'minon, cun ʙa cang safarʙar nasaved, Alloh sumoro ʙa sikancai dardnoke azoʙ mekunad va qavmi digarero ʙa coi sumo ivaz mekunad va har goh ʙa onon gufta savad, ki ʙa cang ʙaroed, onon ʙa cang meʙarojand va itoati Allohu rasulas mekunand va agar az majdoni cang aqiʙnisini karded ʙa Alloh zijone namerasoned, cunki Alloh ʙa sumo nijozmand nest, ʙalki sumo ʙa U nijozmanded. Va U ʙe madadi sumo ham din va pajomʙarasro nusrat xohad dod, zero ki U ʙar har kore tavonost
